fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-During the day, switch between your Incarnate and Therian form.
-(Incarnate) **Earth Power** - Attack  a target.
-(Incarnate) **Rock Slide** - Attack and roleblock a target.
-(Incarnate & Therian) **Stealth Rocks** During the day, set up Stealth Rocks at someone's house. The next night, anyone who visits the target will have their defense reduced by one stage.
-(Therian) **Earthquake** Attack a target. This rampages.
-(Therian) **U-Turn** Astrally attack a target. Redirect a target into another, and transform the redirected's ability into a Basic Attack.

fields.name: Pokemon Ability:
fields.value:
(Incarnate) **Sheer Force** Each night, when you attack a target, you double your Attack.
(Therian) **Intimidate** The player who you visit's Attack Value Is lowered by one stage. This does not affect the same player more than once.
